duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervision over Nursing staff and the medication delivery system
Training new Caregivers along with trainings for existing caregivers
Designation person in charge when administrator is absent
Plan and oversee admission, nursing, and patient care process
Adheres to practices in accordance with the regulations of the state
Oversee development, oversight, and maintaining Quality Assurance Program for nursing staff
Orders, Stores, and assists with medication according to physician orders
Assists with Resident care, meals, move-outs, and move-ins as needed
Observes and communicates any changes in resident condition
Completes and reviews incident reports as needed
Maintain current Resident record for each Resident including but not limited to; obtaining current physician orders, clarifying orders, and alert monthly charting
Answering, responding to call lights, and door alarms as needed
Knows and follows Emergency Procedures, Elopement, and all other procedures
Attends and completes all assigned training to meet DSS regulations
Keeps resident information confidential; respecting Resident rights; respecting privacy

education_certification.credential: Must be certified as an LPN or RN
